seo.description: Award-winning tattoo studio in Manchester's Chapel Street. Custom designs, walk-ins welcome. 5-star rated with 178+ reviews. Book your session today.

items.title: Flash & Small Custom
features: Flash designs or simple custom work

testimonials.quote: Danny absolutely smashed my sleeve piece. The detail work is incredible and he made the whole process so chill. Worth every penny.
testimonials.author: Marcus T.

testimonials.quote: Been going to Maple Syrup for years now, never had a bad experience. Clean, professional, and the work always heals perfectly.
testimonials.author: Jess M.

paragraphs: Started in a tiny studio above a café on Chapel Street, Maple Syrup Tattoo has grown into Manchester's most beloved ink destination. The name came from our founder's Canadian heritage and a shared love of breakfast – but don't worry, we take our tattooing much more seriously than our morning meals.

What sets us apart isn't just our perfect Google rating or our prime Salford location. It's the fact that every client leaves feeling like they've made a friend, not just gotten a tattoo. Whether you're after a delicate fine-line piece or a bold traditional design, we treat every project with the same attention to detail.
about.callout: Every tattoo tells a story – we just help you write it in ink.
about.imageAlt: Danny tattooing at Maple Syrup Tattoo studio

items.question: Do you take walk-ins?
items.answer: Absolutely! We love walk-ins, especially for flash pieces and smaller work. That said, booking ahead guarantees your slot and lets us prepare properly for custom designs.

items.question: What's your minimum charge?
items.answer: Our shop minimum is £80, which covers most small pieces and simple designs. This includes the consultation, design time, and of course the actual tattooing.

items.question: How do I prepare for my appointment?
items.answer: Eat a good meal beforehand, stay hydrated, and avoid alcohol for 24 hours before your session. Bring ID and wear something comfortable that gives easy access to the area being tattooed.

finalCta.headline: Ready for Your Next Tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: Join the hundreds of satisfied clients who've made Maple Syrup their go-to tattoo destination
